column4: Hi, how can I prevent any applications from stealing the focus? It's always like this: I start <application> and switch the focus to the terminal, then I start with the su command and while I'm typing the password, <application> steals the focus; consequently I don't know what characters are written and what are missing.
it's extremely annoying because it happens all day
I want to grab the fucking computer and throw it out of the window
